titleInfo.title: Interior of Londoner's Store, Denver, Colo.

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: #816 Credit Denver Public Library Western History Department Order # 06989 Londoner's Store 15th and Arapahoe Denver Business Groceries''''. On envelope: ''#816 Londoner's Grocery, Interior 15th and Arapahoe''.

mods.abstract: Canned goods and staples inside the Londoner Store located at 15th Avenue and Arapahoe Street in Denver, Colorado. The Londoner grocery store was owned by Wolfe Londoner, mayor of Denver from 1889 to 1891.
mods.note: Courtesy of Denver Public Library's Western History and Genealogy Department.
Gift of Denver Public Library's Western History and Genealogy Department.
